Michele Tizzoni

Infectious Diseases. Complex Networks. Data Science.

  • Two accepted papers to WWW'17

    Two papers which I have co-authored have been accepted to WWW’17 the 26th International Conference on World Wide Web, that will take place in Perth, Australia, on April 3-7 2017. Both papers have been accepted in the newly introduced Computational Health track.

    December 23, 2016
    in News

  • New paper on EPJ Data Science

    The paper “Predicting human mobility through the assimilation of social media traces into mobility models” which I co-authored together with M. Beirò, A. Panisson and C. Cattuto, has been published on EPJ Data Science.

    October 25, 2016
    in News

  • Two new publications

    Two papers I have co-authored have been recently published: “Fast and accurate dynamic estimation of field effectiveness of meningococcal vaccines” by Argante L, Tizzoni M and Medini D., and “Quantifying social contacts in a household setting of rural Kenya using wearable proximity sensors” by Kiti, M et al.

    July 1, 2016
    in News

  • New manuscript on Arxiv

    Check out the manuscript “Predicting human mobility through the assimilation of social media traces into mobility models” by Beirò M, Panisson A, Tizzoni M and Cattuto C.

    January 19, 2016
    in News
